name: Ignite Hospitality
description:
Ignite Hospitality Marketing are a pioneering London-based agency. They're a team of creatives, marketers, strategists and web gurus that specialize in hospitality booking optimization for clients worldwide. 
Their aim is to maximize the guests that visit hotels, restaurants, spas and bars using a mix of their Core Four Services.
 Ignite Hospitality achieve remarkable Return on Investment for their clients using creative and strategic high-impact approach.
